title: Club Dishabille
description: How do you fall in love in the modern world when you have a teenagedaughter and a codependent ex? You seek out the owner of a fetish club, of course. Dahlia was on the desperate side of lonely. Alex was on the jaded side of not any more. At his sister's urging, he sent Dahlia a text.She texted back. Dahlia's foolish expectations and Alex's poor impulse control sucks you into a romance that proves that love can be the easiest thing in the world. Dishabille cleans the slate of the Ugly Cry and floods you full of Oxytocin, Serotonin, and Dopamine.You might have to change your knickers.
author: Arden Aoide
